title: David Lammy – 2020 Comments on the Independent Review of the Human Rights Act
author: admin
summary: The comments made by David Lammy, the Shadow Secretary of State for Justice, on 7 December 2020.
content:
It is bonkers that the Government is prioritising launching an attack on human rights in the middle of the coronavirus pandemic.
